channel.title: How do I open my config folder?
channel.description: everyone on youtube videos have been saying to open your config folder to edit things but mine wont open............. its the config.class and it wont let me open it some1 plz help

item.title: How do I open my config folder?
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

cfg files are just for item shit and npc spawns, for programming you don’t need to.

Read full topic

item.source: How do I open my config folder?

item.title: How do I open my config folder?
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

config folder and config.class are two different things. If you mean config folder, where your npc spawns/item definitions etc. are stored, then that should be in your server’s data folder.

Config.class? go to your src folder and locate the Config.java.

Not sure which one you mean because you mentioned both. You will also need to use NotePad to open a .cfg file.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I open my config folder?

item.title: How do I open my config folder?
item.dc:creator: @Lil_Tyrone Lil Tyrone
item.description:
@Lil_Tyrone wrote:

You need to decompile it. You only can open .java files.

Read full topic
